product_name: Von Zipper Lomax Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The fun and stylish Von Zipper Lomax Polarized sunglasses boast a hip look that will boost your style points. Lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility at any temperature, and they are impact resistant. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Rugged cam hinges boost durability. Rubber nosepads and temples keep sunglasses in place when the activity level rises. Von Zipper Lomax polarized sunglasses feature 6-base-curve lenses; the higher the number the more curved the lens-VonZipper sunglasses feature 6, 8 and 9 base curves.
short_description: The fun and stylish Von Zipper Lomax Polarized sunglasses boast a hip look that will boost your style points.
